job.title: Machine Learning Engineer (Remote/Anywhere)
job.description: Collabora is always looking for passionate and talented software developers to join our geographicallydistributed engineering team We are growing so read on and discover what you could be involved withbrbrstrong Key Responsibilities brbrstrongDiscussing technology with clients and represent Collabora at conferences and trade shows to demonstrate and promote our leadership in the open source arenabrbrAnalysing client problems and designing solutions leveraging open source technologies and Collaboras technical expertisebrbrDefining and scoping client projects in collaboration with the delivery teambrbrWorking with a team of engineers based globally to implement and contribute both to client and open source projectsbrbrContributing publicly to open source projects to ensure Collaboras continuing technical leadershipbrbrGaining working knowledge of customers products applications technical and business strengths and target marketsbrbrUnderstanding client needs and reconciling time constraints available technologies and resources and open source best practicesbrbrstrong Requirements brbrstrongTechnical SkillsbrbrKnowledge in machine learning ML techniques supervised unsupervised and proficiency in high and lowlevel programming languages CCPython is a musthavebrbrStrongExtensive foundation in Math eg linear algebra bayesian statistics multivariate calculusbrbrProven track record of experience in opensource software developmentmethodologies is essential as well as a good standing in any relevant open source communitybrbrAcademic and Research Publications in the Machine Learning domain is a big plusbrbrDemonstrable contributions to components in open source projectsbrbrstrong Commercial Skills brbrstrongUnderstanding client needs and reconciling time constraints available technologies and resources and open source best practicesbrbrAbility to work in a global context with clients and engineers spanning continentsbrbrKnowledge of customers organization management product target market applications and decision making internal processbrbrstrong Personal Skills brbrstrongSelf learning skill to get sufficient knowledge of Collaboras services business model project delivery life cycle and other related technical domainsbrbrSelfmotivated and reliable with a demonstrable passion for learning and collaborationbrbrVery good English language skills both verbal and writtenbrbrAbility to work and communicate in an online globally distributed environmentbrbrCollabora is a software consultancy specializing in bringing companies and the Open Source community together We combine years of Open Source software leadership with an understanding of the challenges that businesses nonprofits and governments face Collabora brings deep technical expertise in system integration amp architecture graphics multimedia web engines and communications to a number of market verticals including mobile IVI  automotive set top box  smart TV and a range of other specialized embedded applicationsbrbrCollabora has the unique business model of enabling enterprises to leverage Open Source software in their solutions Having worked with notable industry leading companies in the automotive aerospace and handset mobile verticals amonst many others Collabora has established a broad customer portfolio
